title.rendered: Tastebudz Yuzu Sour Strain Autoflower Seeds

content.rendered:
🍋 Yuzu Sour Strain – Autoflowering Cannabis Seeds by Tastebudz Syndicate

Zesty, potent, and powerfully uplifting — the Yuzu Sour Strain is a citrus-fuelled hybrid with serious terpene appeal.

Bred from a unique fusion of Critical x Lemoncello x Mimosa Auto, this slightly indica-dominant autoflower delivers bold flavours, compact structure, and rapid results in just 8–9 weeks. With THC levels reaching up to 26%, the Yuzu Sour Strain provides the perfect balance of soothing body calm and uplifting mental clarity.

These autoflowering cannabis seeds require no light cycle adjustment and are ideal for collectors who appreciate terpene-rich profiles and quick returns.

🌟 Featured in the Tastebudz Seeds Auto Mix 2 Pack

📊 Yuzu Sour Strain Specs

Feature Details
Genetics Critical x Lemoncello x Mimosa Auto
Strain Type Slightly Indica-Dominant Hybrid (Autoflowering)
Flowering Time 8–9 Weeks
Indoor Yield 350–500g/m² (Info Only)
Outdoor Yield 500–600g/plant (In Ideal Conditions)
THC Content Up to 26%
Flavours Sour citrus, lemon peel, mandarin, diesel
Aromas Sweet citrus, fuel, Yuzu zest
Effects Relaxing, euphoric, uplifting

🍊 Flavour & Aroma of Yuzu Sour Strain

The Yuzu Sour strain is an aromatic showstopper. Its flavour bursts open with sour lemon, mandarin orange, and tangy Yuzu fruit, layered over deep diesel and earthy citrus notes. Expect a sharp, mouth-watering inhale with a clean citrus-diesel exhale that lingers.

This strain’s unique terpene profile includes:

  • Limonene
  • Beta Caryophyllene
  • Alpha & Beta Pinene
  • Myrcene
  • Eucalyptol
  • Valencene
  • Alpha Humulene, and more.

A delight for collectors focused on terpene diversity and aroma-rich seeds.

💥 Effects of Yuzu Sour Strain

Thanks to its balanced indica-sativa lineage and up to 26% THC, the Yuzu Sour strain offers an experience that’s both mentally elevating and physically relaxing. Many collectors describe it as:

  • Euphoric
  • Uplifting
  • Calming
  • Ideal for winding down or staying focused

It’s a solid all-rounder that provides clarity, balance, and mood support — without couchlock or sedation.

🌿 Yuzu Sour Strain – Seed Collector Notes

Yuzu Sour autoflowering cannabis seeds are valued for their quick lifecycle, usually finishing in 8–9 weeks from seed. Their compact growth and resin-rich appearance make them a favourite among seed collectors looking to expand their citrus-heavy hybrid selection.

Whether you collect for potency, aroma, or variety, Yuzu Sour stands out with its distinctive scent and high-performance autoflowering traits.

✅ Why Choose Yuzu Sour Strain?

🍋 Bold citrus-diesel flavour with notes of Yuzu and mandarin
⚡ 8–9 week seed-to-finish lifecycle
🧬 Hybrid genetics combining Critical, Lemoncello, and Mimosa Auto
🧠 Balanced effects: uplifting, relaxing, and mentally clear
🌱 Compact and resilient autoflowering structure
💥 Up to 26% THC for a strong, well-rounded experience
📦 Great option for premium souvenir seed collections
🌍 Available for worldwide shipping via official retailers
✈️ Direct tracked shipping available to the USA

❓ Frequently Asked Questions – Yuzu Sour Strain

1. What is the Yuzu Sour strain?
Yuzu Sour is an autoflowering hybrid by Tastebudz Syndicate, bred from Critical, Lemoncello, and Mimosa Auto. It’s known for its bold citrus flavour and well-balanced effects.

2. Is the Yuzu Sour easy to collect and store?
Yes. Its compact structure and stable autoflowering genetics make it ideal for both seasoned and new collectors looking for reliable, high-quality seeds.

3. How long does Yuzu Sour take to finish its lifecycle?
These autoflowering cannabis seeds complete their cycle in 8–9 weeks, making them fast and efficient souvenirs.

4. What does the Yuzu Sour taste like?
It features a sharp citrus-diesel profile with strong notes of Yuzu, lemon, and mandarin — a treat for those who enjoy fruit-forward, terpene-rich strains.

5. Is Yuzu Sour  more indica or sativa?
Yuzu Sour is a slightly indica-dominant hybrid, combining body-calming effects with a clear, uplifting cerebral high — ideal for balanced relaxation.

6. What makes the Yuzu Sour unique?
The Yuzu Sour strain stands out for its rare citrus-diesel flavour profile, complex terpene blend, and quick autoflowering cycle — all in a compact, high-THC package.
